title: Towers of Flesh - 'Antithetical Conjurations'
description:
Description
Description: TOWERS OF FLESH
Genre : Blackened Death Metal
Label : Candlelight Records
Location : Birmingham, UK.

The trio was founded in 2008 on a wholly unconventional writing dynamic in the sense that all musical duties were to be split between two members. The bandÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s debut album 'The Perpetual Paradox' was mastered by Mick Kenney (Anaal Nathrakh) and recorded in two split sessions; the first, in July Ã¢â‚¬Ëœ09 and the second, in September Ã¢â‚¬Ëœ09 at Hellfire Studios in Birmingham (previously done work for Motorhead, Immortal and Orange Goblin). It was released through the Midlands based label Dissected Records and received highly enthusiastic reviews throughout the underground music scene.

Although the band has played live extensively in support of the debut album it seems as though appearances on the live circuit have now become rare. However, all members have remained prominent within the UK underground and stand assured in the belief that they have been successful in amalgamating their influences and creating something fresh and invigorating for the listener with their latest album 'Antithetical Conjurations Name Size
